rules_text:
Vanishing X, where X can’t be 0. [i](You choose.)[/i]
Whenever one or more time counters are removed from Awaiting Yhzag, exile the top card of your library face-down, then create a 2/2 black Cultist creature token with prowess. That token gains haste until end of turn.
When the last time counter is removed from Awaiting Yhzag, put each card exiled with it into its owner’s hand.

When Awaiting Yhzag enters and whenever a time counter is removed from it, create a 2/2 black Cultist creature token with prowess. That token gains haste until end of turn.
When the last time counter is removed from Awaiting Yhzag, draw a card for each Cultist you control.
